what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal hercedccd Fetch wrangle data Department Education’s Common Core Data

what: The common core reports data modification in several categories — GLOSSARY_OF_DATA_FLAGS
title: The common core reports data modification in several categories — GLOSSARY_OF_DATA_FLAGS
text: common core reports data modification several categories

title: The common core reports data modification in several categories — GLOSSARY_OF_DATA_FLAGS
The common core reports data modification in several categories — GLOSSARY_OF_DATA_FLAGS
text: object class tbl_df/tbl/data.frame 9 rows 4 columns DMS_FLAG <chr> short description data modified Missing <lgl> TRUE numeric values available data Tweaked <lgl> TRUE reported value different initial raw submitted value Measured <lgl> TRUE reported value matches submitted value

title: The common core reports data modification in several categories — GLOSSARY_OF_DATA_FLAGS

what: The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels — GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES
title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels — GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES
text: Common Core Data uses long names student grade levels

title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels — GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES
The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels — GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES
text: object class tbl_df/tbl/data.frame, 19 rows 2 columns Order <int> sort order grade label. Kindergarten 0 GRADE <chr> long-ish name grade, e.g. "Grade 9"

title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for student grade levels — GLOSSARY_OF_GRADES

what: The Common Core of Data uses long names for racial/ethnic identities — GLOSSARY_OF_OMB_RACES
title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for racial/ethnic identities — GLOSSARY_OF_OMB_RACES
text: Common Core Data uses long names racial/ethnic identities

title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for racial/ethnic identities — GLOSSARY_OF_OMB_RACES
The Common Core of Data uses long names for racial/ethnic identities — GLOSSARY_OF_OMB_RACES
text: object class tbl_df/tbl/data.frame, 9 rows 2 columns Census Letter <chr> Census tables use one-letter suffix, "D", indicate pertain single OMB race RACE_ETHNICITY <chr> OMB racial/ethnic identity, "Asian American".

title: The Common Core of Data uses long names for racial/ethnic identities — GLOSSARY_OF_OMB_RACES

what: The Common Core of Data uses only two sexes — GLOSSARY_OF_SEXES
title: The Common Core of Data uses only two sexes — GLOSSARY_OF_SEXES
text: Common Core Data uses two sexes

title: The Common Core of Data uses only two sexes — GLOSSARY_OF_SEXES
The Common Core of Data uses only two sexes — GLOSSARY_OF_SEXES
text: object class tbl_df/tbl/data.frame, 4 rows 3 columns SEX <chr> "Female,"  "Male," two different versions "." Non-Female <lgl> TRUE SEX "Female," FALSE otherwise. Non-Male <lgl> TRUE SEX "Male," FALSE otherwise.

title: The Common Core of Data uses only two sexes — GLOSSARY_OF_SEXES

what: The Common Core of Data tables include specific subtotals — GLOSSARY_OF_TOTAL_INDICATORS
title: The Common Core of Data tables include specific subtotals — GLOSSARY_OF_TOTAL_INDICATORS
text: Common Core Data tables include specific subtotals

title: The Common Core of Data tables include specific subtotals — GLOSSARY_OF_TOTAL_INDICATORS
The Common Core of Data tables include specific subtotals — GLOSSARY_OF_TOTAL_INDICATORS
text: object class tbl_df/tbl/data.frame, 5 rows 5 columns Race <lgl> TRUE subtotal pertains one OMB race. Sex <lgl> TRUE subtotal pertains one sex. Grade <lgl> TRUE subtotal pertains one grade. Includes Adults <lgl> TRUE subtotal includes adult students. TOTAL_INDICATOR <chr> description subtotals' characteristics

title: The Common Core of Data tables include specific subtotals — GLOSSARY_OF_TOTAL_INDICATORS
